trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for <xref:System.EventArgs> classes which support optionally raising exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para <xref:System.EventArgs>classes que suporte opcionalmente a desencadear exceções.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The IntegrationExceptionEventArgs class enables the user to preview an exception before it is raised.
trans-unit.target: A classe de IntegrationExceptionEventArgs permite ao utilizador uma exceção de pré-visualização, antes de ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos, defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>propriedade `true` para indicar que deve ser emitida a exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to raise the <xref:System.Exception> specified by `exception`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para aumentar o <xref:System.Exception>especificado pelo `exception`; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to raise the <xref:System.Exception> specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se quer emitir o <xref:System.Exception>especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> </xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the ThrowException property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos, defina o valor da propriedade ThrowException para `true` para indicar que deve ser emitida a exceção.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*> will be raised; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>será gerado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.Exception*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
